TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Colors extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一组预定义的颜色。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 颜色名称匹配的.NET Framework 中，Windows 窗体和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]颜色名称。The Windows Presentation Foundation color names match the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)] color names. 这种表示形式基于 UNIX X11 命名颜色值。This representation is based on UNIX X11 named color values. 下图显示了每个预定义的颜色、 名称和其十六进制值。The following image shows each predefined color, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![预定义的颜色](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "预定义的颜色")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 颜色表中包括一个颜色样本、 颜色名称和十六进制值Color Table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 请参阅的各种其他更复杂的方式，您可以添加一个区域，包括渐变颜色类 (， ) 或图像 ()。See the class for a variety of other more complex ways you can color an area, including gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 不能声明在该托管的类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但您可以使用其静态属性赋值中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

public: static property System::Windows::Media::Color AliceBlue { System::Windows::Media::Color get(); };

span.span: Represents colors in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.
